body:
# Breaking Changes

> [!NOTE]
> Manually overriding a sampling decision now always overrides the decision maker tag for future distributed trace propagation.

# Components

## Application Security Management (WAF)

* :sparkles::test_tube: Add support for content parts and image URLs in AI Guard (#10449 - @smola)
* :sparkles: Analyze okhttp client redirections as separated request (#10252 - @manuel-alvarez-alvarez)

## Continuous Integration Visibility

* :sparkles: Use component as framework tag in manual API (#10313 - @daniel-mohedano)

## Crash Tracking

* :sparkles: Strip temp suffix from known library names (#10335 - @amarziali)

## Data Streams Monitoring

* :bug: Avoid NPE on DSM context extraction (#10491 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Fix DSM queue names with Kafka Connect IBM MQ connectors (#10318 - @johannbotha)
* :sparkles: Initial version of transactions tracking implementation for DSM (#9899 - @kr-igor)

## Dynamic Instrumentation

* :bug: Fix SymDB startup (#10493 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Enable Code Origin by default for JDK21+ (#10468 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Avoid throwing exception for invalid modifiers (#10458 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix SymDB  when processing corrupted jars (#10453 - @jpbempel)
* :sparkles: Add support of Kotlin's SourceDebugExtension (#10448 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix debugger start when endpoints aren't available (#10401 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix NullPointerException when scope failure (#10333 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix exceptions raised from Collection values (#10322 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: fix NullPointerException in ClassesToRetransformFinder (#10316 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: Fix ArrayOutOfBoundsException in ER sanity checks (#10314 - @jpbempel)
* :bug: fix Capture Expressions for line probes (#10303 - @jpbempel)

## Library Injection

* :sparkles: Enable websocket instrumentation by default (#10437 - @tlhunter)

## ML Observability (LLMObs)

* :bug: Fix LLMObs trace batching and payload size telemetry (#10395 - @ygree)
* :bug: Avoid sending empty payloads to the LLMObs endpoint (#10372 - @ygree)
* :bulb: Add openai-java v3.0+ instrumentation (#9959 - @ygree)

## Metrics

* :broom: Extract metrics from communication (#10399 - @PerfectSlayer)

## OpenFeature

* :bug: Add test case for OF.7: empty targeting key compliance (#10445 - @leoromanovsky)
* :bug: Bump OpenFeature SDK to 1.20.1 (#10438 - @leoromanovsky)
* :bug: Fix ISO 8601 date parsing to support variable precision (#10419 - @leoromanovsky)

## Profiling

* :sparkles: Bump ddprof to 1.37.0 (#10487 - @jbachorik)
   (see https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/compare/v_1.34.4...v_1.37.0 for details)
* :bug: Should not access the thread states of none Java threads by @zhengyu123 in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/346
* :bug: Add alignment checks to NativeFunc mark methods by @jbachorik in https://github.com/DataDog/java-profiler/pull/348
* :sparkles: Log profiler flare messages at WARN level (#10444 - @jbachorik)
* :bug: Allow running wallclock profiler even without tracer (#10298 - @jbachorik)

## Trace context propagation

* :bug::warning: Always record force keep decisions for future distributed trace propagation (#10308 - @mcculls)

## Tracer core

* :sparkles: Add process tags related to service naming (#10480 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Avoid primitive boxing in v0.5 serializer (#10471 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Add safety check for TargetSystem encoding limits (#10451 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Compute basehash without allocating a stringbuilder (#10411 - @vandonr)
* :sparkles::zap: Avoid primitive boxing in v0.4 serializer (#10408 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Introduce @AppliesOn to override advices InstrumenterModule target system (#10404 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Introducing TagMap EntryReader (#10339 - @dougqh)
* :bug: Ledger.reset should reset containsRemoval status (#10338 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Service discovery: defer FFM methodhandles resolutions (#10312 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: Use pure FFM to write on service discovery memfd from java 22 (#10295 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles::zap: Enabling optimized map by default (#10016 - @dougqh)
* :sparkles: Replace JCTools queues with VarHandle-based implementations for Java 25+ (#9896 - @amarziali)

## Tracer internal logging

* :sparkles: Support DD_TRACE_LOG_LEVEL (#10441 - @mcculls)

# Instrumentations

## Eclipse Vert.x instrumentation

* :bug: Have Vertx 4.0 prioritize `path` and fallback to `name` (#10382 - @mhlidd)

## GraphQL instrumentation

* :bug: Add Custom Exception Handler to Unwrap `CompletionException` for GraphQL Instrumentations (#10389 - @mhlidd)

## Kafka instrumentation

* :bug: Fix missing consumer_group and topic tags in DSM Kafka 3.8+ metrics (#10464 - @johannbotha)
* :sparkles: Use WithTypeStructure to check declaresField (#10307 - @amarziali)

## WebSocket Instrumentation

* :sparkles: Enable websocket instrumentation by default (#10437 - @tlhunter)

## All other instrumentations

* :broom: Move pure context tracking instrumenter to InstrumenterModule.ContexTracking (#10425 - @amarziali)
* :bug: Avoid duplicate headers when injecting on java.net http client (#10315 - @amarziali)
* :sparkles: CICS tracing (#10301 - @deejgregor - thanks for the contribution!)
* :bug: Avoid null store put on Ignite instrumentation (#10291 - @amarziali)
* :bulb: Add openai-java v3.0+ instrumentation (#9959 - @ygree)
